data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Centromacronema Ulmer 1905 (Hydropsychidae: Macronematinae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dias, Everton S., Calor, Adolfo R. (2016): Two new species of the genus Centromacronema Ulmer 1905 (Hydropsychidae: Macronematinae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4137 (1): 129-136, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.1.10
